reviewText: I have the dvd collection and love watching and making their recipes. Looking forward to 7  Great item to pass on to grandkids.

I really love this TV show.  Now I can watch it whenever I want to.
I would recommend this product to everyone
Another great and informative. Cooking show! Why can't we have one like this in Australia .any one can cook from watching this

In this series you get some of the best chefs in the country showing you how they do what they do.  They make the most fantastic food and they make it look so easy. The love of what they do comes through in every segment and you never get bored watching.  One of my favorite parts is the un-biased way in which they test utensils and equipment.  You know that they're telling the truth and that you can trust their conclusions.  I'm addicted to this show and could watch it several times a day.
Want some great cooking advice? You can't go wrong with any of the America's Test Kitchen products. Can I give this 10 stars?
I have bought a number of these dvd's  so I am not going to review all of these.
Love the Cook's Country DVD serices
Great advice for bringing great cooking to the ordinary home cook.
Another fine collection, from Cook's Country
Cook's Country: Season 6 ... I love the book
Always enjoy Cook's Country shows and recipes - I wish the recipes were on the DVD too be read on a computer
